div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 2337 Las Ansies, 30 km. NW of Gerona, (602) 1872 Burial: c. 200 B.C. (Jenkins) Contents: 137 AR. In bronze vase Emporiae: 9 dr., 1 fr. Iberian: 7 dr. ( Emporitan type) Roman Rep.: 120 den. Disposition: unknown Pujol y Camps, MNE 1872-3, pp. 170-83 â€ Zobel y Zangroniz, MNE 1877-9, pp. 138-9, 217 de Guadan, Numisma 16 (1955), p. 15; MPER, pp. 98-103 Villaronga, GacNum 9 (1968), pp. 24-5 Crawford, RRCH 104
